channel.title: Lots of rs accounts!
channel.description:
Links removed
Discussing account recovery (posting accounts you've recovered, giving tips/asking for help) is now against the MoparScape rules

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We’ve decided this is against the rules. We can’t control the activity of the users outside of the forum, and at first I thought this was only recovering dormant accounts for your own use, but this has become an enterprise and you guys aren’t caring how inactive accounts are or anything. So from this point on, no discussion of recovering accounts.

You can see the updated rule in the rule topic for this section.

No one will be punished for anything done before this change.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

If they are dormant, no one uses them… its almost like a empty can of canned food, no one wants/uses it anymore, and they just throw it in the trash can, a homeless guy takes it, I doubt the FBI is going to go after something no one cares about/Has no use for anyone else… Why let it just go to waste?

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

That’s like saying stealing money from people that aren’t using it is ok because then it goes back into the economy

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

There are thousands of dormant accounts with cash and phats on them. We’re just reincorperating them into the economy.

Read full topic

@ranger_squad wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:1280, topic:410849”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=512110.msg3837786#msg3837786 date=1323017277]

Anything under 60 days last logged in isn’t “dormant”, and recovering those I would consider hacking

How is it hacking? It’s using Jagex’s system to our advantage, and at no point (in the recovery) do I say “I own the account”, I merely put when the account was created

Exactly, and the only reason if I remember that hacking is bannable because well isn’t it because its illegal? This is not illegal, we are just abusing their system, in no way illegal
[/quote]

Notice how David deleted his post haha[/quote]No I didn’t? Do you not know how to click a quote link?

Let me help you.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

EDIT - Though your argument is invalid anyway:

Account Recovery Please enter [b]your account[/b] name to login. If you created your account after November 2010, this will be your email address.
We do not have a recovery email address on our systems for [b]your[/b] account. Please enter the information requested below.
When did [b]you[/b] create this account?
So unless you put in the recover 'I do not own this account', you are saying that it's yours, and that you made it. Completely dishonest.

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of rs accounts!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:1262, topic:410849”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=512110.msg3837061#msg3837061 date=1322964643]
Anything under 60 days last logged in isn’t “dormant”, and recovering those I would consider hacking
[/quote]

How is it hacking? It’s using Jagex’s system to our advantage, and at no point (in the recovery) do I say “I own the account”, I merely put when the account was created[/quote]Illegal access to anything IS hacking, just don’t tell david it logged in yesterday

No really, there have been 2 lawsuits through this. Just because you abused someone system, still means you are accessing something not yours = hacking.

Read full topic
